content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start the negotiation. What is your offer for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I can offer 500 euros per month. This is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment of this size in München.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is indeed a fair price for an unfurnished apartment of that size in Munich. However, I am looking for a higher price. How about 600 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Would you consider 550 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, but 550 euros per month is still lower than what I am looking for. I am willing to go up to 575 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 575 euros per month is a better price, but it is still quite expensive for me as a student. Would you consider 560 euros per month as a fair price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 560 euros per month is still lower than what I am looking for, but I appreciate your negotiation skills. I am willing to meet you halfway at 570 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 570 euros per month is a good price for me, but I was hoping for something lower as a student. Would you consider 565 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, but 565 euros per month is too low for me. I am willing to go up to 568 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 568 euros per month is a fair price for me. I accept this offer. I agree to the price of [568] Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [568] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
